entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
